<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Greater Magical Edification](/Feats.aspx?ID=2004) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 179 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Loremaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=65)

**Prerequisites**
[Magical Edification](/Feats.aspx?ID=2001)

</column>

---

You've continued to expand your compendium of tools to compile knowledge. You can cast [_comprehend language_](/Spells.aspx?ID=46), [_mindlink_](/Spells.aspx?ID=195), and [_secret page_](/Spells.aspx?ID=270) as innate occult spells, each once per day. When you cast _secret page_, it is automatically heightened to the same spell level as your cantrips from Magical Edification.
